programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Benny and Cheryl find more common ground and bond over lunch but their friendship causes unexpected discomfort for Chan. Hafiq's rise in popularity as an influencer puts Khatijah in the spotlight.

programme.title: FBI S4
programme.desc: After a young girl is kidnapped from her daycare, the team must help her parents navigate a debt owed to the deadly gang in their neighborhood. Also, Maggie struggles to focus on the case when her sister, Erin, returns from rehab.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S3
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House Of The Year S6
programme.desc: Join Kevin McCloud, Michelle Ogundehin and Damion Burrows for an exclusive look at the extraordinary new homes competing for the 2021 RIBA House of the Year award. Over four one-hour specials, we explore the inspiration and stories behind these builds. Categories include houses that take us by surprise, homes that reinvent a popular style, problem-solving homes and homes that showcase exceptional materials and craftsmanship.

programme.title: Slugterra S2
programme.desc: Slugterra is an epic sci-fi comedy adventure set deep underground, where the ammo's alive and only the quick survive! In this luminous, high-tech, underground world every cavern holds a new adventure, new battle and weird little slugs to be discovered!

programme.desc: The adventures of average suburban boy Johnny Test, who wittingly plays test subject for his genius twin sisters' various experiments, reluctantly fighting evil villains in the process.

programme.title: Dino Pororo S1

programme.title: Sunshine Station
programme.desc: Jimmy and Jenny run a very special bus station - the Sunshine Station! It isn't just a place you go to get to a destination. At the Sunshine Station, pre-schoolers embark on a learning journey to discover the world around them by going to various interesting locations around Singapore.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: Ollie and Cherry disagree on the telling of Red Riding Hood. When the Triangle Aliens give them a special machine that allows them to enter the story, they end up revamping the classic tale. When Yellow Square loses a tooth, he gets a gold coin from the tooth fairy. Learning about this, the Imp is determined to catch the tooth fairy for himself.

programme.desc: Follow small, grasshopper-sized boy named Gus who wishes to become the greatest knight in all the kingdom of Karamel! Armed with his laser sword and mounted on his electric pony, Gus will never miss an opportunity to pursue adventure and win the day.

programme.desc: With rising living costs, Budget Shops / Dollar Stores have grown significantly in recent years, with more and more people looking for ways to save money on everyday items and stretch their dollar. But... with ingredients lists in foreign languages and unbelievably low prices ($1 deals), are these too good to be true?
